text:
TomCat 4's JDBC realm doesn't use connection pooling.
I believe that this will cause a busy site to run slowly if many people attempt
to authenticate simultaneously.
creator: mslinn@mslinn.com
remm@apache.org
text:
A shared connection pool implementation will be soon made available as part of 
the "commons" Jakarta subproject.
This problem (if it indeed turns out that the JDBC realm would cause 
performance problems) should be easy to address then.
I'll mark the bug as resolved, with resolution = LATER to reflect this.

creator: pier@betaversion.org
text: Reopened bug to change assignee (should be Remy)
